OUTLINE : This multicenter , cohort study . Patients assign 1 2 cohort ( prior treatment per CCG-1922 [ prednisone v dexamethasone ] v prior treatment per CCG-1952 [ intrathecal ( IT ) methotrexate v IT methotrexate , cytarabine , hydrocortisone ] ) . Patients cohort stratify accord age diagnosis , gender , time since prior treatment termination . - Cohort A ( CCG-1922 ) : Patients undergo physical neurological examination , neurobehavioral evaluation , quality life assessment . Neurobehavioral evaluation assess memory , attention , executive function . - Cohort B ( CCG-1952 ) : Patients undergo evaluation . Neurobehavioral evaluation ass visual-motor integration process speed . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 448 patient ( 224 per cohort ) accrue study within 4 year .
